page.title: 15Religion in the area
page.content:
The congregation worshipping at the church in{Waldringfield}is of a mixed age group. There is a branch of the Mother's Union and a Church Fete is held every year.The church is of Church of England denomination,those who wish to attend Baptist Chapel go to Waldringfield Heath some 3 miles away.
An older age group attend the church at{Shottisham},again C of E.There is no branch of the M.U. but each year the church and congregation hold a Shrove Tuesday Supper and a Harvest Supper.There is also an annual Bazaar and Cheese and Wine Parties are held throughout the year.
Catholics can worship at Woodbridge.
